
$\begin{vmatrix}a&b&c\\ d&e&f\\ g&h&i\end{vmatrix}$

$$
\begin{cases}
2x_1^2 + x_2^{2} \leq 10 \\
x_1 + 3x_2 \leq 15 \\
x_1, x_2 \geq 0
\end{cases}
$$

$$
\begin{align}
	A &= B \\
	  &= C \\\\
	  &= D \\\\\\
	  &= D
\end{align}
$$

$$
% adjacent TeX escapes: `\}\{` must preserve both backslashes through markdown
\{a\}\{a\}
$$

$$
% Various escapes
\begin{align}
\% \& \_ \#
\\
a\;b\,c\!d
\end{align}
$$

$$
\_\_
$$

$$
\texttt{\_\_init\_\_}
$$

$$
\verb|__|
$$

$$
\verb|__a__|
$$

$$
\_a\_
$$
